welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cheektowaga, a charming city known for its friendly people and rich history. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and vibrant culture during your visit. Enjoy your time here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves additional domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal via a shuttle bus.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves private and charter flights, offering services such as fueling and maintenance.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport is a modern facility with all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Catharines Airport is equipped to handle all types of cargo and offers efficient processing and handling services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
